name: photo-of-the-day-april-6-2009
title: Photo Of The Day: April 6, 2009
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: As a part of our effort to forget about what’s happening outside our office windows right now, we’ll just keep staring at this whimsical photo by Peppysis which, if you’ll notice, contains no snow. Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
As a part of our effort to forget about what’s happening outside our office windows right now, we’ll just keep staring at this whimsical photo by Peppysis which, if you’ll notice, contains no snow.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
